# This is Question 1
 
```{r}
n_dims1 <- 3:10
n_dims <- sample(n_dims1,1)

vector1 <- 1:n_dims^2
randVec1 <- sample(vector1)

matrix1 <- matrix(data=randVec1, nrow=n_dims, ncol=n_dims)
matrix1

t(matrix1) # it has switched byrow to TRUE

sum(matrix1[1,])

sum(matrix1[n_dims,])

```
